title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, the perfect heating solution for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. This black, indoor electric heater is designed to provide you with quick and efficient heat, all while keeping you safe and comfortable.

With its compact dimensions of 7.72 inches width, 6.38 inches depth, and 9.13 inches height, and weighing only 2.6 pounds, this space heater is lightweight and easy to move around. It features intuitive controls and a thermostat, allowing you to easily adjust the temperature to your liking.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater offers two power options for customized heating: low heat at 750W and high heat at 1500W. Additionally, it has a fan mode for air circulation, ensuring optimal comfort in any season.

Safety is a top priority with this heater. It includes overheat protection, automatically shutting off if it gets too hot, and tip-over protection, which activates when the heater is tilted at a 45-degree angle. These features provide peace of mind, especially for elderly folks who may be prone to accidents.

The heating element of this space heater is made of PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) ceramic, which enables rapid heat generation in just 2 seconds. Despite its powerful performance, the noise level remains below 45 dB, ensuring a quiet and peaceful environment.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, guaranteeing its safety and quality. Its sleek black design fits seamlessly into any room decor.

Stay warm and cozy with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, the perfect heating solution for elderly folks who value safety, comfort, and ease of use.

Safety is our top priority, which is why this space heater is equipped with advanced safety features. It has overheat protection, which automatically shuts off the heater if it gets too hot. The tip-over protection feature ensures that the heater turns off when tilted at a 45-degree angle, preventing any accidents.

This space heater is designed with ease of use in mind. It has intuitive controls and a built-in thermostat, allowing you to easily adjust the temperature to your liking. The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, guaranteeing its safety and quality. It is powered by electricity and comes in a stylish black color that complements any decor.
